conbody.p: Euca2ools are included with installation packages of Eucalyptus. Please check with your administrator to confirm that Euca2ools is installed properly on your client machine.
conbody.draft-comment: Do we need to tell folks how to install these on specific distros? Or just a general set of instructions? We did in the previous verion (http://open.eucalyptus.com/wiki/Euca2oolsInstallationCentos5.5_v1.3)>.
